name: Better Money
description: Better Money (BETTER) is the first social token backed by the message of "better money", and spreading thereof. Created by artist and propagandist Lucho Poletti, BETTER will be used to incentivize and reward the collection of NFT's and fine art pieces as well as rewards to liquidity providers, as a method of payment to purchase NFT's, and merchandise on luchopoletti.com. Better Money is based on hard money principals, and therefore will not be gifted under any conditions. Nothing good comes easy. BETTER must be earned.
